meanings.definition: The act or process of congealing.
meanings.sent1: The congealments of the jelly were fascinating to watch.
meanings.sent2: The congealments of the ice cream made it difficult to scoop.
meanings.sent3: The congealments of the pudding looked like a wobbly tower.
meanings.sent4: The congealments of the lava created a hardened crust on the volcano.
meanings.sent5: The congealments of the glue held the pieces together firmly.

meanings.sent1: The congealments of fat in the soup floated on the surface.
meanings.sent2: The congealments of blood formed a clot on the wound.
meanings.sent3: The congealments of chocolate in the fridge looked like little rocks.
meanings.sent4: The congealments of wax on the candlestick were hard to remove.
meanings.sent5: The congealments of paint on the palette dried into colorful blobs.

meanings.sent1: The congealments of sauce on the plate were cold and unappetizing.
meanings.sent2: The congealments of jelly on the toast were sticky and sweet.
meanings.sent3: The congealments of cheese on the pizza made it hard to separate slices.
meanings.sent4: The congealments of oil in the pan needed to be scraped off.
meanings.sent5: The congealments of frosting on the cake were thick and creamy.
